title: Efficient Customs Clearance
description: In 2019, Albania had an average customs clearance time of just 1.1 days for exports, showcasing its efficiency in trade logistics.

title: High Frequency of Tax Meetings
description: In 2019, 93.2% of firms in Albania reported having meetings with tax officials, with an average of 5.7 meetings per affected firm.

title: Minimal Patent Applications by Nonresidents
description: In 2021, Albania recorded only 1 patent application by nonresidents, indicating limited international innovation activity.

title: Limited Railway Goods Transport
description: In 2021, Albania transported 25.1 million ton-km of goods via railways, reflecting a modest capacity in freight transport.

title: Low Railway Passenger Usage
description: In 2021, only 0.812 million passenger-km were recorded on Albanian railways, suggesting limited use of rail transport for passengers.

title: Low Satisfaction of Family Planning Demand
description: In 2018, only 6% of married women in Albania had their demand for family planning satisfied by modern methods, indicating a gap in reproductive health services.

title: Minimal ICT Goods Imports
description: In 2022, ICT goods constituted just 0.21% of Albania's total goods imports, showing a low reliance on technology imports.
